languages.text: "Я верно понимаю, что вы решили открыто выступить против догматов Механикус? Призываете к ереси?"
"Am I to understand that you have decided to openly oppose the dogma of the Adeptus Mechanicus? You are calling for heresy now?"
languages.original_text: "Я верно понимаю, что вы решили открыто выступить против догматов Механикус? Призываете к ереси?"

traits.locale_text: "Am I to understand that you have decided to openly oppose the dogma of the Mechanicus? You are calling for heresy now?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Am I to understand that you have decided to openly oppose the dogma of the Mechanicus? You are calling for heresy now?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Am I to understand that you have decided to openly oppose the dogma of the Mechanicus? You are calling for heresy now?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Am I to understand that you have decided to openly oppose the dogma of the Adeptus Mechanicus? You are calling for heresy now?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我是否可以理解为，你已经打算公然反对机械修会的教条？你是在寻求异端的知识吗？”
languages.original_text: "Am I to understand that you have decided to openly oppose the dogma of the Adeptus Mechanicus? You are calling for heresy now?"

traits.locale_text: “我是否可以理解为，你已经打算公然反对机械修会的教条？你是在寻求异端的知识吗？”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Dois-je comprendre que vous avez décidé de vous opposer au dogme de l'Adeptus Mechanicus ? Avez-vous l'intention de sombrer dans l'hérésie ? »
languages.original_text: "Am I to understand that you have decided to openly oppose the dogma of the Adeptus Mechanicus? You are calling for heresy now?"

traits.locale_text: « Dois-je comprendre que vous avez décidé de vous opposer au dogme de l'Adeptus Mechanicus ? Avez-vous l'intention de sombrer dans l'hérésie ? »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «¿Puedo suponer que ha decidido oponerse abiertamente al dogma del Adeptus Mechanicus? ¿Está proclamando la herejía?».
languages.original_text: "Am I to understand that you have decided to openly oppose the dogma of the Adeptus Mechanicus? You are calling for heresy now?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Puedo suponer que ha decidido oponerse abiertamente al dogma del Mechanicus? ¿Está proclamando la herejía?».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「つまり、堂々と帝国技術局の教義に反すると決心したと、理解していいと？異端に傾倒しているということだな？」
languages.original_text: "Am I to understand that you have decided to openly oppose the dogma of the Adeptus Mechanicus? You are calling for heresy now?"

traits.locale_text: 「つまり、堂々と機械教団の教義に反すると決心したと、理解していいと？異端に傾倒しているということだな？」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Soll das heißen, dass Ihr entschieden habt, Euch offen gegen das Dogma des Adeptus Mechanicus zu stellen? Ihr fordert jetzt Ketzerei?"
languages.original_text: "Am I to understand that you have decided to openly oppose the dogma of the Adeptus Mechanicus? You are calling for heresy now?"

traits.locale_text: "Soll das heißen, dass Ihr entschieden habt, Euch offen gegen das Dogma des Mechanicus zu stellen? Ihr fordert jetzt Ketzerei?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "Am I to understand that you have decided to openly oppose the dogma of the Adeptus Mechanicus? You are calling for heresy now?"

languages.text: "Adeptus Mechanicus dogmasını açık bir şekilde reddettiğini mi anlamalıyım? Şimdi de kâfirliği mi çağırıyorsun?"
languages.original_text: "Am I to understand that you have decided to openly oppose the dogma of the Adeptus Mechanicus? You are calling for heresy now?"

traits.locale_text: "Adeptus Mechanicus dogmasını açık bir şekilde reddettiğini mi anlamalıyım? Şimdi de kâfirliği mi çağırıyorsun?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
